SELECT board_no_seq.currval FROM dual
insert into board (board_no,board_name,board_title, board_pwd,board_cont,board_hit,board_ref,board_step, board_level,board_date, board_category) values(board_no_seq.nextval, #{board_name},#{board_title},#{board_pwd},#{board_cont},0, board_no_seq.nextval,0,0,sysdate,#{board_category})
